name: Pizza Bites
description: Lunchbox favourite with a fun twist to satisfy little tummies! With kid-friendly flavours, even your pickiest eaters are sure to eat their lunches! Make a big batch of bites ahead of time and freeze so they’re easy to grab in a pinch. Dip in prepared Marinara Sauce for the full pizza experience.
preparation: In a medium bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients.
In another bowl, whisk together eggs and milk. Stir in cheese and toppings, if using.
Fold dry ingredients into wet ingredients until evenly combined.
Place a Perfect Petites mold on a Sheet Pan. Using a basting brush, lightly brush with oil.
Divide evenly between petites and bake until a toothpick inserted in centre comes out clean, about 20–25 minutes.
When cool to the touch, flip mold onto Sheet Pan and twist to pop out.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1⁄2 cup plain 2% Greek yogurt with 1 tbsp Summer Berry Sweet Dip Mix and 1 cup veggies with 2 tbsp prepared Lemon Dilly Dip.

products.name: Pizza Seasoning (1002291)
summary: In a world of complex gastronomy, pizza is a testament to the simple pleasures we all crave. Now you can get it by the spoonful! This blend delivers the nostalgic flavours and feeling of eating pizza, with notes of basil, oregano, garlic, tomato, and green bell peppers with loads of Parmesan. And yes, there is a mild whisper of chilli, too!
